messages.message: The meeting ID has been copied to the clipboard
messages.translation: El ID de la reunion ha sido copiado al portapapeles
no se pudo comenzar la reunión

messages.id: Configured Mumble port is not valid: {PortMumble}
messages.message: Configured Mumble port is not valid: {PortMumble}
messages.translation: El puerto configurado para Mumble es inválido: {PortMumble}
La reunión no se pudo cerrar: {Err}

messages.id: internal Tor instance has already been closed
messages.message: internal Tor instance has already been closed

messages.id: The onion service can't be deleted: {Err}
messages.message: The onion service can't be deleted: {Err}
messages.translation: El servicio Onion no se pudo eliminar: {Err}

messages.id: The invitation email has been copied to the clipboard
messages.message: The invitation email has been copied to the clipboard
messages.translation: El correo de invitación ha sido copiado al portapapeles
Unirse a una reunión a travéz de Wahay

messages.id: Please join the Wahay meeting with the following details:
messages.message: Please join the Wahay meeting with the following details:
messages.translation: Por favor únete a la reunión a travéz de Wahay con los siguientes detalles:

messages.id: The Meeting ID cannot be blank
messages.message: The Meeting ID cannot be blank
messages.translation: El ID de la reunión no puede ser vacío

messages.id:
the provided meeting ID is invalid: 

{MeetingID}
messages.message:
the provided meeting ID is invalid: 

{MeetingID}
messages.translation:
el ID de la reunión provisto es inválido: 

{MeetingID}
El ID de la reunión es inválido

messages.id: the Mumble client can not be used because: {LastError}
messages.message: the Mumble client can not be used because: {LastError}
messages.translation: El cliente Mumble no se puede usar porque: {LastError}
por favor especifique una contraseña válida
especifique la confirmación de la contraseña

messages.id: enter a password at least 6 characters long
messages.message: enter a password at least 6 characters long
messages.translation: especifique una contraseña de mínimo 6 caracteres

messages.id: If you disable this option, anyone could read your configuration settings
messages.message: If you disable this option, anyone could read your configuration settings
messages.translation: Si deshabilita esta opción, cualquier persona podría leer los parámetros de configuración

messages.id: Allow the host to automatically join a newly created meeting
messages.message: Allow the host to automatically join a newly created meeting
messages.translation: Permita que el organizador se una automáticamente a una reunión cuando cree una nueva

messages.id: Are you sure you want to do this action?
messages.message: Are you sure you want to do this action?

messages.id: Are you sure you want to end this meeting?
messages.message: Are you sure you want to end this meeting?

messages.id: Are you sure you want to leave this meeting?
messages.message: Are you sure you want to leave this meeting?

messages.translation: Unirse automáticamente al iniciar una reunión

messages.id: Automatically join this meeting when starting it
messages.message: Automatically join this meeting when starting it
messages.translation: Unirse automáticamente a esta reunión al iniciarla

messages.id: Be very careful. This information is sensitive and could potentially contain very private information. Only turn on these settings if you absolutely need it for debugging.
messages.message: Be very careful. This information is sensitive and could potentially contain very private information. Only turn on these settings if you absolutely need it for debugging.
messages.translation: Ten mucho cuidado. Esta información es confidencial y podría contener información muy privada. Solo cambia esta configuración si la necesita absolutamente para la depuración.

messages.id: By clicking Yes, this meeting will end.
messages.message: By clicking Yes, this meeting will end.
messages.translation: Al hacer clic en Sí, esta reunión finalizará.

messages.id: By clicking Yes, you will leave this meeting.
messages.message: By clicking Yes, you will leave this meeting.
messages.translation: Al hacer clic en Sí, saldrá de esta reunión.

messages.id: Check this option to automatically join every meeting you host
messages.message: Check this option to automatically join every meeting you host
messages.translation: Marque esta opción para unirse automáticamente a cada reunión creada en la sección del anfitrión

messages.id: Choose your email service to send invitation
messages.message: Choose your email service to send invitation
messages.translation: Elija su servicio de correo electrónico para enviar la invitación.

messages.id: Configuration settings will be lost in the next session
messages.message: Configuration settings will be lost in the next session
messages.translation: Los ajustes de configuración se perderán en la próxima sesión

messages.id: If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.
messages.message: If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.
messages.translation: Si realiza una copia de seguridad del archivo de configuración, restableceremos la configuración y continuaremos normalmente. Si el archivo de configuración está cifrado, le pediremos una contraseña para cifrar el nuevo archivo de configuración.

messages.id: If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.
messages.message: If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.
messages.translation: Si establece esta opción con un nombre de archivo, la información de bajo nivel se registrará allí.

messages.id: Keep configuration file when Wahay closes
messages.message: Keep configuration file when Wahay closes
messages.translation: Mantener el archivo de configuración al cerrar Wahay

messages.id: Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.
messages.message: Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.
messages.translation: Registre la salida de depuración en el archivo de registro seleccionado. Si no se selecciona ningún archivo, la salida del registro se escribirá en el archivo de registro predeterminado.

messages.id: Now you are hosting a meeting.
messages.message: Now you are hosting a meeting.

messages.id: Please enter the master password for the configuration file.
messages.message: Please enter the master password for the configuration file.
messages.translation: Ingrese la contraseña maestra para el archivo de configuración.

messages.id: If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.
messages.message: If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.
messages.translation: Si desea utilizar su propia instancia de Mumble, ingrese la ubicación donde Mumble está disponible en el sistema.

messages.id: If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535
messages.message: If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535
messages.translation: Si desea configurar un puerto personalizado para ejecutar el servicio Mumble, ingrese un número de puerto entre 1 y 65535

messages.id: Specify a password for the meeting
messages.message: Specify a password for the meeting
messages.translation: Especifique una contraseña para la reunión

messages.id: The meeting ID is invalid, please check it.
messages.message: The meeting ID is invalid, please check it.
messages.translation: La ID de la reunión no es válida, verifíquela.

messages.id: A valid port is between 1 and 65535
messages.message: A valid port is between 1 and 65535
messages.translation: El rango de puertos válidos está entre 1 y 65535
Esta acción no se puede deshacer

messages.id: Type the Meeting ID (normally a .onion address)
messages.message: Type the Meeting ID (normally a .onion address)
messages.translation: Escriba la ID de la reunión (normalmente una dirección .onion)

messages.id: Type the password to join the meeting
messages.message: Type the password to join the meeting
messages.translation: Escriba la contraseña para unirse a la reunión
Escriba su nombre de usuario preferido

messages.id: We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?
messages.message: We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?
messages.translation: Hemos detectado que el archivo de configuración no es válido o está dañado. ¿Desea hacer una copia de seguridad y continuar?

messages.id: When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.
messages.message: When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.
messages.translation: Cuando esta opción está marcada, la configuración se guardará en el dispositivo.

messages.id: You will not be asked for this password again until you restart Wahay.
messages.message: You will not be asked for this password again until you restart Wahay.
messages.translation: No se le volverá a solicitar esta contraseña hasta que reinicie Wahay.

messages.id: Communication is a basic need of the human being, in its beginnings it is carried out verbally from person to person through the use of technology, various tools have been developed for this purpose stories such as: Skype, Zoom, Google Hangouts, etc. However, there are several aspects that have not been considered in the development of these solutions: centralized servers, proprietary technology, security, are some aspects that have not been contemplated or have been partially implemented.
messages.message: Communication is a basic need of the human being, in its beginnings it is carried out verbally from person to person through the use of technology, various tools have been developed for this purpose stories such as: Skype, Zoom, Google Hangouts, etc. However, there are several aspects that have not been considered in the development of these solutions: centralized servers, proprietary technology, security, are some aspects that have not been contemplated or have been partially implemented.
messages.translation: La comunicación es una necesidad básica del ser humano, en sus inicios se realizaba verbalmente de persona a persona sin embargo mediante el uso de tecnología se han desarrollado diversas herramientas para este propósito tales como: Skype, Zoom, Google Hangouts, etc. Sin embargo existen varios aspectos que no han sido considerados en el desarrollo de estas soluciones: servidores centralizados, tecnología propietaria, seguridad, son algunos aspectos que no han sido contemplados o han sido implementados de forma parcial.

messages.id: Wahay (https://wahay.org) has been developed as a tool for conducting voice conferences in an easy, extremely secure and decentralized manner (without the need for any centralized server or service). Internally it uses TOR (https://www.torproject.org/) as a tool to establish secure communications and Mumble (https://www.mumble.com/) as a client to establish voice over IP.
messages.message: Wahay (https://wahay.org) has been developed as a tool for conducting voice conferences in an easy, extremely secure and decentralized manner (without the need for any centralized server or service). Internally it uses TOR (https://www.torproject.org/) as a tool to establish secure communications and Mumble (https://www.mumble.com/) as a client to establish voice over IP.
messages.translation: Wahay (https://wahay.org) se ha desarrollado como una herramienta para realizar conferencias de voz de forma fácil, extremedamente segura y decentralizada (sin la necesidad de ningún servicio o servidor centralizado).  Internamente usa TOR (https://www.torproject.org/) como herramienta para establecer comunicaciones seguras y Mumble (https://www.mumble.com/) como cliente para establecer voz sobre IP.

messages.id: Tor is a free and open source tool that allows you to establish anonymous and distributed communications. TOR directs its internet traffic through a series of routers called 'onion routers' allowing anonymous communication between its nodes, this network works from a set of organizations and individuals that donate their bandwidth and processing power.
messages.message: Tor is a free and open source tool that allows you to establish anonymous and distributed communications. TOR directs its internet traffic through a series of routers called 'onion routers' allowing anonymous communication between its nodes, this network works from a set of organizations and individuals that donate their bandwidth and processing power.
messages.translation: Tor es una herramienta libre y de código abierto que permite establecer comunicaciones anónimas y distribuidas. TOR dirige su tráfico de internet a través de una serie de routers llamados ‘routers cebolla’ permitiendo mantener anónima la comunicación entre sus nodos , esta red funciona funciona a partir de un conjunto de organizaciones e individuos que donan su ancho de banda y poder de procesamiento.

messages.id: Mumble is a free and open source application that allows voice over IP conferences between users with high sound quality and low latency.
messages.message: Mumble is a free and open source application that allows voice over IP conferences between users with high sound quality and low latency.
messages.translation: Mumble es una aplicación libre y de código abierto que permite establecer conferencias de voz sobre IP entre usuarios con alta calidad de sonido y baja latencia.

messages.id: Wahay allows you to host a meeting or join an existing meeting, for this you establish an ID that will serve as the identifier of the meeting to use.
messages.message: Wahay allows you to host a meeting or join an existing meeting, for this you establish an ID that will serve as the identifier of the meeting to use.
messages.translation: Wahay permite organizar una reunión o unirse a una reunión existente, para esto establece un ID que servirá como el identificador de la reunión a utilizar.

messages.id: This option allows starting the server that will support the connection of users to a meeting which is defined by its ID (meeting identifier), this ID must be used by the rest of users who wish to access it. Additionally it is possible to define the user name (not mandatory) that will be used to identify the user in the meeting, it is also possible to configure the password to access the meeting, which will be required by users who wish to access Wahay.
messages.message: This option allows starting the server that will support the connection of users to a meeting which is defined by its ID (meeting identifier), this ID must be used by the rest of users who wish to access it. Additionally it is possible to define the user name (not mandatory) that will be used to identify the user in the meeting, it is also possible to configure the password to access the meeting, which will be required by users who wish to access Wahay.
messages.translation: Esta opción permite iniciar el servidor que soportará la conexión de usuarios a una reunión la cual se encuentra definida por su ID (identificador de reunión), este ID deberá ser usado por el resto de usuarios que deseen acceder a la misma. Adicionalmente es posible definir el nombre de usuario (no obligatorio) que se usará para identificar al usuario en la reunión, también es posible configurar la clave para acceder a la reunión, la misma que será requerida por los usuarios que deseen acceder a Wahay.

messages.id: The option to automatically join this meeting allows you to start the server and enter it, if you do not select it, you can access it later by selecting the join button. It is also possible to copy the meeting ID and send the invitation by the most used email clients.
messages.message: The option to automatically join this meeting allows you to start the server and enter it, if you do not select it, you can access it later by selecting the join button. It is also possible to copy the meeting ID and send the invitation by the most used email clients.
messages.translation: La opción unirse automáticamente a esta reunión permite iniciar el servidor y ingresar a la misma, en caso de no seleccinarla se podrá acceder posteriormente mediante la selección del botón unirse. También es posible copiar el ID de la reunión y enviar la invitación por los clientes de correo más usados.

messages.id: This option allows the user to access a meeting if already exist, for this you must enter the meeting id (required), username (not required) and password (if was set).
messages.message: This option allows the user to access a meeting if already exist, for this you must enter the meeting id (required), username (not required) and password (if was set).
messages.translation: Esta opción permite al usuario acceder a una reunión ya existente, para esto debe ingresar la identificación de la reunión (requerido), el nombre de usuario (no requerido) y la contraseña (si fue configurada previamente).
